page.title: 02BROMPTON - CLUBS
page.content: Clubs in Brompton cater for three main groups,women,over 60's and children.A Mother and Toddler group is held twice a month in the Church Hall for mothers with babies and pre-school children.It gives the chance for children to play while mothers meet new friends.The W.I.meets each month on Tuesday evenings at the Village Hall.They are particularly interested in food skills and crafts.The Brompton W.I.has raised money for many charitable organisations including providing kidney machines and the talking newspaper for the blind.An over 60's club meets in the Village Hall to provide entertainment,interests and trips for the older people of Brompton.Children's clubs include 2 Youth Clubs(for those up to 18) and troops of Cubs,Scouts,Brownies and Guides.
